alert.note: Alert for Bamberg; Orangeburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued April 05 at 4:00PM EDT until April 05 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Southern Bamberg County in central South Carolina... South central Orangeburg County in central South Carolina... * Until 500 PM EDT. * At 400 PM EDT, a confirmed large and extremely dangerous tornado was located over Allendale, moving northeast at 35 mph. This is a PARTICULARLY DANGEROUS SITUATION. TAKE COVER NOW! HAZARD...Damaging tornado. SOURCE...Radar confirmed tornado. IMPACT...You are in a life-threatening situation. Flying debris may be deadly to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be destroyed. Considerable damage to homes, businesses, and vehicles is likely and complete destruction is possible. * The tornado will be near... Rivers Bridge State Park around 420 PM EDT. Branchville around 455 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Ehrhardt and Rowesville. TORNADO...OBSERVED TORNADO DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN
info.instruction: To repeat, a large, extremely dangerous and potentially deadly tornado is on the ground. To protect your life, TAKE COVER NOW! If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to an interior room or closet on the lowest floor of a sturdy building immediately.
